title: On Social Media, Hunting for Voter Fraud Becomes a Game
description: Players who post about irregularities are awarded points or titles, leading participants to question the legitimacy of elections.
dc:creator: Sheera Frenkel
media:description: A woman monitored a ballot drop box in a parking lot in Mesa, Ariz., on Oct. 24. Hunting for voter fraud has become a game on social media.
